page.title: 10Here Today...
page.content: In Ebchester there is a lot of { {wildlife }but if we don't preserve it, it will all die.The{department of the {environment}keeps check on the river to make sure factories aren't just dumping chemicals into the river.The{ {R.S.P.B.}looks after all of the birds and makes sure that one species isn't killing off another species of birds.I can't imagine the world without trees so the{department of the environment} looks after them too.We have a couple of{Herons}and {Mallards}in our river,I have spotted them on several occasions.We are very lucky to live in such a nice village.
